long_description: The ample Mountainsmith Tour TLS waistpack stows your hiking, travel and school essentials-and then some! Breathable, tuck-away hipbelt and ergonomic lumbar pad offer a comfortable fit; back panel features a sleeve for airline tickets. Spacious main compartment features bright yellow lining for increased visibility and hanging organizer pocket. Interior padded sleeve holds a smart phone or MP3 player. Low profile, mesh side pockets are perfect for water bottles or other small items. Removable shoulder strap with 3 in. pad offers a comfortable carrying alternative; load leveler straps compress the load and enhance stability. The Mountainsmith Tour TLS waistpack is made with recycled PET along with high-tenacity nylon in key wear areas.
short_description: The ample Mountainsmith Tour TLS waistpack stows your hiking, travel and school essentials-and then some!
